data.text: @mattyGagnon @MapleLeafMadman @CTVNews Careful, those pro-face diaper wearers will have your head for that.

@CTVNews True freedom. Off with the face diapers. It's time to stop being so afraid of germs. I bet if we showed the 80s & 90s how petrified we are of a virus they'd be laughing themselves sick while side-by-side in concerts or butt-naked on beaches. Your fear is the cause of your misery.
@CTVNews And so the Covid Air swirls all around them

@CTVNews Do the ppl in Edmonton know that? Edmonton is under siege from Communist Notley and Terrorist Sohi, sort of like Canada being under siege by Communist Trudeau and Khalistani Terrorist Singh, when will this Political Shit End?
@mattyGagnon @MapleLeafMadman @CTVNews You will be labeled a racist and a bigot for this. Just wait.....
@Fernand_1981 @MapleLeafMadman @CTVNews It in no way makes them stupid
